import React from "react"; import {Form,Col, Row, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Input, Modal, ModalHeader} from "reactstrap"; import Translate from "../../../Translate"; import jwt from "jwt-simple"; import { CheckSquare, } from "react-feather"; import photo6 from "../../../assets/images/empty_product.svg"; const ItemModal = (props) => { function modalBodyContent() { if(props.type==="delete"){ return( Դուք համոզված ե՞ք ջնջել ) }else{ return(
) } } return ( props.toggleModal(props.type)} size="md"> props.toggleModal(props.type)}> {modalBodyContent()} ); }; export default ItemModal;
